dmca.title: Alias Systems Objects to Resale of Licensed Software (#4)
dmca.body:
OCT-18-04 11:53  PAGE	1/2

Fax Transmission
Page 1 of 2 (including this page)
To: Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints Google
Fax #: [private]


From:	[private]
Senior Legal Counsel Alias Systems Corp.

Email: [private]@alias.com
Telephone	[private]
Fax	[private]

Date:	October 18, 2004
Dear Google User Support, DMCA complaints:


We have recently confirmed that certain Alias software has been advertised for purchase or distribution on the following Google Groups sites.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is Maya 6 Unlimited.

2. The materials infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 are:

From: [private]@pathfinder.gr (code_fu)
Newsgroups: alt.2600.warez
Subject: software cds, last six months
Date: 12 Oct 2004 03:25:39 -0700
Organization: http://groups.google.com
Lines: 1497
Message-ID: [private]@posting.google.com

3. You may contact me at [private]@alias.com.

4_ The owner/administrator of the Messages identified in item #2 may contact me at [private]@alias.com.


Page 1 of 2
OCT
